original_text: And there was a man in Maon, whose possessions were in Carmel; and the man was very great, and he had three thousand sheep, and a thousand goats: and he was shearing his sheep in Carmel.
korean_text: 마온에 한 사람이 있는데 그의 생업이 갈멜에 있고 심히 부하여 양이 삼천 마리요 염소가 천 마리이므로 그가 갈멜에서 그의 양 털을 깎고 있었으니

sentences.original_text: And there was a man in Maon
and the man was very great
and he had three thousand sheep
and he was shearing his sheep in Carmel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 갈멜에서 양의 털을 깎고 있었다
